title: Leave Queue Buster due to Bugsplat
body: I would like to have this removed from account due to the fact of bugsplat.  I am not intentionally leaving the queue so I would not like to be punished with waiting 5 or 10 minutes each time I try to queue up.  So would you please remove this from my account.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, we cannot remove these types of penalties from accounts. Regardless of the reason for the crash, it still negatively impacts everyone in the match. This is a key reason why disconnections are all treated equally and why we cannot modify penalties for any reason.

Bugsplats are typically caused by driver or hardware issues, so I suggest working through our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) as your first step in troubleshooting this. Let me know if this helped.
i have the same problem and have done all the steps to no avail. i am nw at 20 min waits

In that case, you'll want to reach out to our tech team with a set of [Hextech logs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you encounter issues submitting the ticket.
It doesn't affect them as much now due to the remake feature though.  You're saying if you have this leaver buster due to bugsplat you would just deal with it?
